attributes.action: Close Special Schools regarding the COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: The children are main carriers of the virus and they haven't got the immune system to fight it
attributes.background: Close Special Schools for vulnerable children with special needs and high risk health problems such as respiratory issues.

rejection.details:
You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips 

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
